control.name: gridControl1
control.description: The MouseDown event is handled to call the DoShowMenu method if an end user right-clicks on the grid. The DoShowMenu checks whether a column button (red square) was right-clicked. If so, the custom context menu is invoked. The custom context menu is represented by the GridViewColumnButtonMenu class and allows end users to customize the visibility of the grid's columns. The context menu has two items: Columns and Runtime Column Customization. The first item is a sub item, it shows a sub menu that allows the grid's columns to be shown or hidden. The second item invokes the customization form.
